snippet.title: OneBit Adventure Trailer - Profession Update
snippet.description:
OneBit Adventure is an epic retro roguelike where you choose a class and go on a dangerous adventure as you battle monsters in an effort to survive as long as possible. In your travels, you will learn the strengths and weaknesses of different classes and enemies. Choose your targets carefully and take it step by step in this casual turn-based adventure.

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1688320/OneBit_Adventure/

Play now for free on Google Play and App Store:
http://www.onebitadventure.com/play-now/

#OneBitAdventure #Roguelike #Pixel
